column4: can someone help me with my ubuntu not starting up due to video driver problems
can someone help me with my ubuntu not starting up
you getting a grub error?
no
im not getting any error, i just get a black screen after the loading screen
what video card do you have?
ati radeon x1950pro
its supposedly supported by the fglrx driver and worked fine untill today
does the installer cd work fine?
well, it's not like ati is known for their good drivers ;)
to install ubuntu?
yeah, the install CD
i installed it and it was running fine for a good two weeks or so before it started doing this
have you installed or modified any of the xorg drivers since then?
no
try pressing Ctrl-Alt-F1 to switch to the first terminal
the newest driver i think was adding ntfs-3g support but that was last week
see if you can get non-graphical access after it loads
that never works for me.  How about recovery mode
that would work
well, go and try it out! :)
